goals.complete: My mentor and I located Gara, the wounded grawl shaman. He told us about the monster that his people have mistaken for a god. We confirmed the "god" is a dragon minion, and we agreed to help Gara prove that to his people.

goals.active: Help Gara convince the other shamans their god is false.
goals.complete: Due to the opposition of the other shamans, Gara was unable to convince his people that their "god" is just a savage beast. The grawl don't give up their gods easily, so we've decided take bold steps that will prove Gara's claims beyond any doubt.
